products.name: Carnation Breakfast Essentials Nutritional Drink Mix Vanilla - 10 pk

extendedInfo.detail: 13 g protein.  Great taste. 25% less added sugar vs. former drink mix (contains 25% less added sugars than our former drink mix. Added sugars have been reduced from 11 g to 8 g serving). 21 vitamins + minerals. 3x vitamin D vs. milk (3 times the daily value in each prepared serving contains 9.9 mcg (50% DV) Vitamin D vs. 2.9 mcg (15% DV) in 8 fl oz skim milk). 3x calcium vs. Greek yogurt (3 times the daily value in each prepared serving contains 500 mg (40% DV) Calcium vs. 141 mg (10% DV) in 5.3 oz cup Greek yogurt). 13 g protein to support growth and help build & maintain muscle. 100% DV of Vitamin C & 50% DV of Vitamin D, key nutrients for Immune support. 40% DV of calcium to help build strong bones. 220 nutrient rich calories for nutritional energy. 20% DV of Iron to help blood deliver oxygen to the body. Each prepared serving provides an excellent source of protein and 21 vitamins & minerals, including Calcium and Vitamin D. Nutritional Compass: Nestle HealthScience - It's good to know.  New look! improved recipe. Our Mission: Give kids essential nutrients they need to start the day with each yummy sip. For breakfast on-the-go. Available in ready to drink format for where ever the day takes you!  Nutritionally appropriate for ages 4 years and older.  Natural flavor with other natural flavors. No artificial flavor, colors, sweeteners. Facebook; Instagram; Pinterest. Scan here for more food information. Call 1-800-289-7313 for more food information.  Question / comments 1-800-289-7313 Monday-Friday, 8am-8pm ET. For product information visit us at CarnationBreakfastEssentials.com.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Nonfat Milk, Maltodextrin, Sugar, Vitamins And Minerals (Vitamins And Minerals: Calcium Phosphate, Magnesium Hydroxide, Sodium Ascorbate, Choline Bitartrate, DL-Alpha Tocopheryl Acetate, Ferric Phosphate, Niacinamide, Manganese Sulfate, Copper Gluconate, Zinc Oxide, Calcium Pantothenate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Thiamine Mononitrate, Vitamin A Palmitate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid, Vitamin K1, Chromium Chloride, Sodium Molybdate, Vitamin D3, Biotin), And Less Than 2% Of Lactose, Cellulose Gum, Natural Flavor, Salt.
extendedInfo.directions: Milk just add milk or mix it up. Add it to your kid's favorite breakfast recipes such as smoothies, pancakes, or overnight oats for extra nutrition. Easy as 1-2-3! To Prepare: 1. Empty packet into a large glass. 2. Stir in 1 cup cold skim milk. 3. Enjoy!  Store in a cool, dry place.  Lift tab to open.  Once prepared, consume within 2 hours. Cover unused portions, refrigerate and consume within 24 hours.
extendedInfo.warnings: Contains: milk ingredients. May contains wheat and soy.
